document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail & Edgecombe, Gregory D.
document.masterDocTitle: Scolopendromorph centipedes (Chilopoda: Scolopendromorpha) in the Natural History Museum (London): A review of the hitherto unidentified species collected in Africa, with remarks on taxonomy and distribution, and a new species of Otostigmus (Parotostigmus)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Scolopendromorph centipedes (Chilopoda: Scolopendromorpha) in the Natural History Museum (London): A review of the hitherto unidentified species collected in Africa, with remarks on taxonomy and distribution, and a new species of Otostigmus (Parotostigmus)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Natural History Museum of Crete, University of Crete, Knossos Av., Herakleion 71409, Crete, Greece.
Department of Earth Sciences, The Natural History Museum, Cromwell Road, London SW 7 5 BD, United Kingdom.
